content.rendered:
We Are Mangalam Weddings

Welcome to Mangalam Weddings, the best wedding planner in Delhi/NCR, where passion meets perfection. We are a luxury wedding planning and event management company dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences that celebrate love, tradition, and beauty. With meticulous attention to detail and a passion for excellence, we strive to make every wedding a magical and cherished memory. From breathtaking venues to exquisite cuisine, and from personalized service to seamless coordination, we offer top wedding planning services in Delhi. Our goal is to craft an event that reflects your unique love story and vision, leaving you with memories to cherish forever.

At Mangalam Weddings, your dream wedding is our ultimate goal. As a professional wedding planner in Delhi, we pride ourselves on exceeding your expectations. Whether you are looking for an affordable wedding planner or a luxury wedding planner in Delhi, we are here to help. We also specialize in destination weddings, offering top destination wedding planning services for those looking to celebrate their love in a unique location.

Let us make your wedding a day to remember, filled with moments that will be treasured for a lifetime.

What We Do?

At Mangalam Weddings, we are more than just wedding planners – we are memory makers. Think of us as your personal storytellers, dedicated to making every moment of your special day memorable. Whether your moments are quirky or grand, we are here to ensure they feel loved. Our tailored wedding planning packages ensure you get exactly what you want. From luxury to affordable options, we cover everything, making us the best wedding planner in Delhi. You can relax and enjoy your day, knowing your memories are in trusted hands.

Choose Mangalam Weddings, the top professional wedding planner in Delhi, for exceptional wedding planning services, including destination weddings.

Hospitality Services

Weddings are all about making people feel special, and that’s where we shine! We handle everything, from keeping track of who’s coming to making sure everyone has a cozy place to stay and a smooth ride there. Our fantastic team goes the extra mile to create a vibe that’s like a big, warm hug for every guest. With our playful and one-of-a-kind touches, we guarantee a celebration that’s not just fun but totally unforgettable. So kick back, relax, and get ready for a wedding experience that’s as unique as you are!

Artist & Event Management

At Artist & Event Management, we specialize in curating unforgettable experiences through seamless event planning and top-tier talent curation. Whether you’re organizing a corporate gathering, a wedding celebration, or a private soirée, we’re here to elevate your vision to reality. With our keen attention to detail and passion for creativity, we ensure that every aspect of your event reflects your unique style and exceeds your expectations.

 

Decor & Design

Welcome to our world of Decor & Design, where every space tells a story. With an eye for detail and a passion for creativity, we specialize in transforming ordinary spaces into extraordinary experiences. Whether you’re envisioning a cozy home sanctuary, a chic office environment, or a stunning event venue, we’re here to bring your dreams to life. Our team of talented designers and decorators works closely with each client to understand their unique style, preferences, and vision. From elegant furniture selections to exquisite color palettes, every aspect of our designs is curated with precision and care.

Our Team

Devanshu Singh Taneja

Founder & CEO

Devanshu Singh Taneja, a proficient professional holding a Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management, boasts a rich background spanning eight years in weddings and corporate events. With expertise in executing opulent luxury weddings, gala dinners, and concerts featuring top-tier Indian performers, I have earned a reputation as the Best Wedding Planner in Delhi.

Committed to exceeding client expectations, I tailor my services to suit their unique event requirements, ensuring flawless experiences. Whether you need a Professional Wedding Planner in Delhi or an Affordable Destination Wedding Planner, my meticulous planning and execution make every occasion memorable. As a top Wedding Event Planner in Delhi, I offer comprehensive Wedding Planning Services, including luxury and destination weddings.

Devanshu Singh Taneja

Founder & CEO
